robotkaposzta_clipboard.name: Clipboard
robotkaposzta_clipboard.description: Allow to manage the device's clipboard.

enable-drop.name: Enable drop
enable-drop.desc: Enable to users to drag and drop text data into the projects.

read-permission.name: Read permission
read-permission.desc: Request clipboard read permission at start. Note: this will trigger and 'On permission granted' or 'On permission denied' trigger.

write-permission.name: Write permission
write-permission.desc: Request clipboard write permission at start. Note: this will trigger 'On permission granted' or 'On permission denied' trigger.

request-permission.description: Request permission to read or write data to clipboard.

type.name: Type
type.desc: Select the type of the permission.

set-drop.description: Enable or disable to user use drag and drop feature.

mode.name: Mode
mode.desc: Enable or disable drag and drop feature.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the read process to identify it.

text-plain.name: text/plain
text-plain.desc: Plain text data that write to clipboard.

text-html.name: text/html
text-html.desc: HTML text data that write to clipboard.

image-png.name: image/png
image-png.desc: Base64 image data that write to clipboard.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the read process to finish it.

on-permisson-granted.description: Triggers when granted a selected permission

type.name: Type
type.desc: Select the type of the permission.

on-permisson-denied.description: Triggers when denied a selected permission

type.name: Type
type.desc: Select the type of the permission.

is-read-support.description: Check if device support the clipboard read features.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of the support check.

on-read.description: Triggers when read a specific clipboard.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the read process.

on-any-read-error.description: Triggers when any clipboard read runs into error.

on-read-error.description: Triggers when a specific clipboard read runs into error.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the read process.

on-user-paste.description: Triggers when user paste text data into the project.

is-drop-enabled.description: Check if drop features is enabled.

on-user-drop.description: Triggers when user drop text data into the project.

on-user-drag.description: Triggers when user beging drag text data and enter cursor into the project.

on-user-drag-start.description: Triggers when user start drag text data into the project.

on-user-drag-end.description: Triggers when user end drag text data into the project. This action might be a cancel.

has-type.description: True if in read, drag, drop, paste trigger the types conatins the selected type.

is-write-support.description: Check if device support write. Example firefox not support data write.

type.name: Type
type.desc: The type of the support check.

on-any-write.description: Triggers when write any data to the clipboard.

on-write.description: Triggers when write a specific data to a clipboard.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the read process.

on-any-write-error.description: Triggers when any clipboard write runs into error.

on-write-error.description: Triggers when a specific clipboard write runs into error.

tag.name: Tag
tag.desc: The name of the write process.

on-user-copy.description: Triggers when user copy a data from the project.

on-user-cut.description: Triggers when user cut data from the project.

read-tag.description: Get the read process tag in 'On read' trigger.

read-error.description: Get the read error 'On read error' trigger.

read-type-count.description: Get the number of the cipboard's type in 'On read', 'On user paste', 'On user drop', 'On user drag', 'On user drag start' triggers.

read-type-at.description: Get the clipboard's data type at zero based index in 'On read', 'On user paste', 'On user drop', 'On user drag', 'On user drag start' triggers.

at.name: At
at.desc: 0-based index to get readed type name.

read-data.description: Get the clipboard's data in text format in 'On read', 'On user paste', 'On user drop', 'On user drag', 'On user drag start' triggers.

drag-position-x.description: Get the drop x position in 'On drag', 'On drag start' trigger.

drag-position-y.description: Get the drop y position in 'On drag', 'On drag start' trigger.

write-tag.description: Get the write process tag in 'On write' trigger.

write-error.description: Get the write error 'On write error' trigger.
